metadata.title: Tromso Arctic Surveillance
metadata.description: Contains digital satellite data from the satellites NOAA, Landsat 1-5, and SPOT.  The ground truth data/field data are vegetation (reliefs) data, geomorphology, air pollution impact data (long transported/locally), and sea temperature.  Atmospheric physics data are ozone data (satellite and ground measurements).  Also included are Synthetic Aperture Radar (SAR) data (aircraft, buoys).
metadata.notes:
Purpose: This data base is now under development and will probably be linked to the United Nations Environmental Program - Global Resource Information Data Base in Arendal, Norway.  The date base will also play a role in the Norwegian part of the Arctic
Monitoring Program (AMP).

Status: Complete

Maintenance frequency: Unknown

Access constraints: None
